import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Grid, Cell } from 'react-mdl'; import Education from './education'; import Experience from './experience'; import Skills from './skills'; import $ from 'jquery'; class Resume extends Component { arrowClickHandler = (e) => { var arrow = document.getElementById("arrow-icon"); arrow.classList.toggle("open"); e.preventDefault(); var right_col = document.getElementById("resume-right-col"); if (arrow.classList.contains("open")) { right_col.scrollTo({ left: 0, top: 2000, behavior: 'smooth' }); } else { right_col.scrollTo({ left: 0, top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' }); } } render() { return (
{/* */}

Jason Huang

Software Engineer

More creatively than an engineer, more practically than a designer. In the core I'm a creator, discovering and merging meaningful products to change our life.

Trained as an architect, my role integrates Creative Direction, Strategy, and Organization. Currently I'm working as a SDE and my job Integrating Programming&Design to make variety of Sass experiences for my client and users.

Fueling my practice, I explore things beyond Design, leaning how the world being constructed by coding. I love solving problems via programming which fulfills my life in many aspects.

Good products combines with Design and Engineering, which bring excellent experience - that's all what I'm pursuing and creating.
